    • Method Detail

      • readPage

        public static final boolean readPage(URL link,
               URL referer,
               StringBuilder store)
                              throws IOException
        Fully reads a HTTP page into store. Will try 10 times to connect and will wait 10 seconds between each try. Defaults to the UTF-8 charset.
        Parameters:
        link - URL pointing to the page.
        referer - URL of the page that this link was found on or NULL.
        store - Object in which to store the read data.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
